00036 #ifndef NASH2004CONTRACTIONMODEL_HPP_
00037 #define NASH2004CONTRACTIONMODEL_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "AbstractOdeBasedContractionModel.hpp"
00040 #include "OdeSystemInformation.hpp"
00041 #include "Exception.hpp"
00042 
00060 class Nash2004ContractionModel : public AbstractOdeBasedContractionModel
00061 {
00063     static const double kTa;
00064 
00066     static const double e0ByT0;
00067 
00069     double mScaledVoltage;
00070 
00071 public:
00073     Nash2004ContractionModel() : AbstractOdeBasedContractionModel(1)
00074     {
00075         this->mpSystemInfo = OdeSystemInformation<Nash2004ContractionModel>::Instance();
00076 
00077         mScaledVoltage = 0.0;
00078         this->mStateVariables.push_back(0.0);
00079     }
00080 
00087     void EvaluateYDerivatives(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY, std::vector<double>& rDY)
00088     {
00089         double epsilon = (mScaledVoltage < 0.05 ? e0ByT0 : 10*e0ByT0);
00090         rDY[0] = epsilon * (kTa*mScaledVoltage - rY[0]);
00091     }
00092 
00097     void SetInputParameters(ContractionModelInputParameters& rInputParameters)
00098     {
00099         assert(rInputParameters.voltage != DOUBLE_UNSET);
00100         mScaledVoltage = (rInputParameters.voltage+85)/125;
00101     }
00102 
00108     void SetStretchAndStretchRate(double stretch, double stretchRate)
00109     {
00110     }
00111 
00115     double GetActiveTension()
00116     {
00117         return rGetStateVariables()[0];
00118     }
00119 
00124     double GetNextActiveTension()
00125     {
00126         return mTemporaryStateVariables[0];
00127     }
00128 
00129 
00133     bool IsStretchDependent()
00134     {
00135         return false;
00136     }
00137 
00141     bool IsStretchRateDependent()
00142     {
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 };
00146

00148 
00149 #endif /*NASH2004CONTRACTIONMODEL_HPP_*/
